name: Stop shooting yourself! (EricHHL)
description:
You had a special weapon made for you, but an error in the code made it always aim at you instead of never aim at you. But that's your only weapon, so, you've got to work with it!

This is a top-down shooter where you can only control when your drone can shoot, and it always aims at you. Equipped with a segway, at least you're fast enough to get the enemies between you and your drone.

Developers

  • Eric Lopes
  • Luiz de Oliveira

Music

  • Gabriel Bileski (@GabePoirot, Soundcloud)
